Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class cupp::memory1d< T >

Represents a memory block on an associated CUDA device.

Author:
Bj√∂rn Knafla: Initial design

Jens Breitbart

Version:
0.2
Date:
20.06.2007
Supported Platform:
Host only
